title: Google\Cloud\Gaming\V1\ScalingConfig
name: ScalingConfig
description:
Autoscaling config for an Agones fleet.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gaming.v1.ScalingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the Scaling Config

params.name: data.fleet_autoscaler_spec
params.description: Required. Agones fleet autoscaler spec. Example spec: https://agones.dev/site/docs/reference/fleetautoscaler/

params.name: data.selectors
params.description: Labels used to identify the game server clusters to which this Agones scaling config applies. A game server cluster is subject to this Agones scaling config if its labels match any of the selector entries.

params.name: data.schedules
params.description: The schedules to which this Scaling Config applies.
